survey_brief: This survey aims to understand customer preferences and usage patterns of digital banking features to enhance user experience and service offerings.

questions.question_text: How often do you use your bank's mobile app or website for banking transactions?
questions.client_notes: Use a simple frequency scale for clarity. Ensure answer options cover all possible usage patterns.

script.question_text: How often do you use your bank's mobile app or website for banking transactions?

questions.question_text: Which of the following digital banking features do you use regularly? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to accurately capture feature usage.

script.question_text: Which of the following digital banking features do you use regularly? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in your bank's digital banking services?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to gather qualitative feedback. Keep the text box large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in your bank's digital banking services?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the security features of your bank's digital platform?
questions.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who use digital banking (Q1 not 'Never').
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for satisfaction measurement.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the security features of your bank's digital platform?
script.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who use digital banking (Q1 not 'Never').

questions.question_text: Would you be interested in using AI-powered financial advice tools if offered by your bank?
questions.client_notes: Gauge interest in emerging technologies. Keep answer options balanced.

script.question_text: Would you be interested in using AI-powered financial advice tools if offered by your bank?
